application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of the sound insulation of the floor/ ceiling/ walls separating the commercial part(s) of the premises from dwellings, pursuant to Condition 6; details of the installation, operation, and maintenance of the odour abatement equipment and extract system, including the height of the extract duct and vertical discharge outlet, in accordance with Appendix 4G of the LBHF Planning Guidance Supplementary Planning Document - February 2018, pursuant to Condition 9; details of the installation of the Air/Water Source Heat Pump or Electric Boiler, pursuant to Condition 11; details of an Ultra Low Emission Strategy (ULES) for the operational phase of the development in order to mitigate the impact of air pollution, pursuant to Condition 12; details of the installation of Aerobic Food Digesters (AFD) for Class A3/E use Class in order to mitigate the impact of air pollution from vehicles associated with the removal of food waste, pursuant to Condition 13 of planning permission reference: 2020/02763/FUL dated 19th July 2021.
